mapper.select: SELECT ARTICLE_NO, BRD_NO, MEM_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE,HIT, IMAGE,MEM_NAME FROM ALL_BOARD JOIN LOGINBOARD USING (MEM_NO) ORDER BY ARTICLE_NO DESC
SELECT ARTICLE_NO, BRD_NO, MEM_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE,HIT, IMAGE ,MEM_NAME FROM ALL_BOARD JOIN LOGINBOARD USING (MEM_NO) WHERE ARTICLE_NO = #{article_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_BOARD WHERE BRD_NO = 1

SELECT B.ARTICLE_NO, B.MEM_NO, B.TITLE, B.REGDATE, B.HIT, B.MEM_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.ARTICLE_NO, A.MEM_NO, A.TITLE, A.REGDATE, A.HIT, A.MEM_NAME FROM (SELECT ARTICLE_NO, MEM_NO, TITLE, REGDATE, HIT, MEM_NAME FROM ALL_BOARD JOIN LOGINBOARD USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BRD_NO = 1 ORDER BY ARTICLE_NO DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow}) B WHERE B.RNUM > #{startRow}
